name: "Happy" Platformer
description:
WASD to move 
Space to jump

This is Happy Platformer. A rage platformer. But what is wrong? The thing is, there isn't any mechanic for the player that makes you rage. Then how exactly it is a (wrong) rage platformer? Well, it's simple. The player isn't raged. But the opponents are. Are you able to make your way to the 100th platform and win? Good luck!

I'm sorry there is no web build, but please. Give it a shot. It took my much time.
